title: Create FO-11 types and constants
description:
## Objective

Create the TypeScript types, interfaces, and constants for FO-11.

## Spec Reference

**Spec:** docs/projects/2026-02-11-fo-11/2026-02-11-fo-11-spec.md — Sections: "Technical Architecture", "Exchange Structure"

## Scope

**Files to create:**
- app/fo-11/types.ts

## Implementation

1. Define FO11DiscoveryResponse interface with skip: boolean, question: string, initialChips: string[], expandedChips: string[], optional error?: string
2. Define FO11OnboardingData interface with name: string, familiarityLevel: 'new' | 'somewhat' | 'very', exchanges: Array<{ question: string; answer: { text: string } }>
3. Define FO11GenerateBatchOptions and FO11GenerateBatchResult (same pattern as FO-10)
4. The goal question constant: FO11_GOAL_QUESTION = "What's your main goal with affirmations today, [name]?"
5. No FO10_QUESTIONS-style array — only step 4 has a fixed question

Reference app/fo-10/types.ts for the pattern.

## Tests

1. TypeCheck — file compiles without errors

Run: npx tsc --noEmit

Do NOT close until tests pass.
acceptance_criteria: npx tsc --noEmit passes with no errors in fo-11 types
